overview: Colin is a interactive designer living in San Francisco who has worked in deploying projects for Adobe, AAA, Gardner Communications, ON24, Teens in Tech Networks and others. With each new project, comes an opportunity to figure out the problem and a solution for the best user experience possible. Colin has applied his skill as a designer, and his extensive knowledge of Flash, Actionscript, Photoshop, and various other web technologies, to deploy cutting edge design projects. He is the recipient of a Communication Arts Interactive Annual for information design. A devoted educator, Colin teaches design, Flash, and Actionscript in both corporate and college environments.
